means: 狂妄的，自命不凡的，自负的

sentence.Network_en: This pub was of a very different type, smaller, less pretentious.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个酒吧风格独特，面积不大，比较低调。

sentence.Network_en: That's a pretentious name for a dog!
sentence.Network_cn: 狗叫这个名字真够炫的！

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... physique n. (男子的)体格, 体形 pretentious adj. 自命不凡的 EMUabbr. 经济和货币联盟.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... tendentious 有偏见的，有倾向的 pretentious 做作的，自抬身价的 sententious 好说教的，简要的.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●muster v. 鼓起 ●pretentious adj. 自命不凡的，矫饰的 ●labyrinth n. 迷宫.
SAT Official Guide V-Mate ... plot 情节 pretentious 自命不凡的，狂妄的 weighty 严肃的, 认真的.

list.abs: Full of empty or pretentious language ; bombastic ., 言过其实的充满空洞或虚假的语言 ; 吹牛的.
Showy or gaudy decoration ; ostentatious or pretentious show ., 炫耀的或俗丽的装饰 ; 浮华的或虚假的显示.
Character  -... ... 花池子[ flower bed] 花架子[ nice but false appearance;pretentious flourish] 淮南子[ Huainan Zi].
He is a pretentious writer ., 他是个自负的作家.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French prétentieux, from prétention (see pretension)

entry.tran: 自命不凡的；自负的；矫饰的；炫耀的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something is pretentious, you mean that they try to seem important or significant, but you do not think that they are.

example.ex: His response was full of pretentious nonsense...
example.tran: 他的答复是一派荒谬的虚夸之词。

example.ex: This pub was of a very different type, smaller, less pretentious.
example.tran: 这个酒吧风格独特，面积不大，比较低调。

means.word_mean: 1. making claim to or creating an appearance of (often undeserved) importance or distinction;
2. intended to attract notice and impress others;
3. of a display that is tawdry or vulgar

auth_sentence.content: We may appear ludicrously pretentious; our numbers negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content: We may appear ludicrously pretentious; our numbers negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We may appear ludicrously pretentious; our numbers negligible.

auth_sentence.content: An immaculate...house, grand enough, but not pretentious.
auth_sentence.res_content: An immaculate...house, grand enough, but not pretentious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An immaculate...house, grand enough, but not pretentious.

auth_sentence.content: The ether was less pretentious, but gave up anyway.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ether was less pretentious, but gave up anyway.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ether was less pretentious, but gave up anyway.

stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸展出去的→注意的,有礼貌的
intention[n.意图,意向,目的]+al表形容词→adj.有意图的, 故意的
pre前+tent伸展,趋向+ious……的→提前摆出一种姿态→做作的
attentive[adj.注意的;有礼貌的]+ly表副词→adv.注意地, 留意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 注意,注意力;立正;特别照顾;照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出去→注意;照料

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广度,宽度,长度;程度,限度
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tent伸展,趋向→伸出去的范围→广度,宽度
intent[adj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图]+ion表名词→n.意图,意向,目的
tent伸展,趋向→伸展开用来遮雨,阳光等→帐篷

means.word_mean: 狂妄的, 自命不凡的, 自负的
